## Public Member Functions

### handleRemoveResources() {#a32fde803e73f967356cae1ce410f7448}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>virtual Error llvm::orc::ResourceManager::handleRemoveResources (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/jitdylib">JITDylib</a> &amp; JD, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/orc/#a48eb648e96394270c69273c29bfad24e">ResourceKey</a> K)</>}>
This function will be called <em>outside</em> the session lock.

ResourceManagers should perform book-keeping under the session lock, and any expensive cleanup outside the session lock.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/core-h/#l00132">132</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/core-h">Core.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### handleTransferResources() {#a5501f0d6bf40fe6e57e7d12362f113cd}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>virtual void llvm::orc::ResourceManager::handleTransferResources (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/jitdylib">JITDylib</a> &amp; JD, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/orc/#a48eb648e96394270c69273c29bfad24e">ResourceKey</a> DstK, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/orc/#a48eb648e96394270c69273c29bfad24e">ResourceKey</a> SrcK)</>}>
This function will be called <em>inside</em> the session lock.

ResourceManagers DO NOT need to re-lock the session.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/core-h/#l00136">136</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/core-h">Core.h</a>.
